txt.en: 'They have seen better days, traveller. My husband will not agree with me, but I fear for the safety of our people. The Orcs have taken a great many of our croftlands from us, and many crofters dread straying outside the walls each day. I have urged my husband to reconsider and allow the defenceless to leave for the Westemnet, but he will not heed my words....'
